alert.note: Alert for Adams (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 17 at 6:25PM CDT until June 17 at 7:15PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central Concordia Parish in northeastern Louisiana... Southern Adams County in southwestern Mississippi... * Until 715 PM CDT. * At 625 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Kingston, or 11 miles south of Natchez, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Kingston around 635 PM CDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
